snippet: For 21-year-old Carlos Montañez, his family and passion for radio is what motivates him to follow his dream of working in broadcasting, despite life’s roadblocks.
abstract: Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies, one of the seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, awards Carlos Montanez $2,000 scholarship to continue his studies for career in broadcasting at Brooklyn College.
lead_paragraph: For 21-year-old Carlos Montañez, his family and passion for radio is what motivates him to follow his dream of working in broadcasting, despite life’s roadblocks.
